name: tekura basic
matches: ^(\w+) pumps out at you with a powerful side kick\.$
^(\w+) unleashes a powerful hook towards you\.$
^(\w+) lets fly at you with a snap kick\.$
^(\w+) balls up one fist and hammerfists you\.$
^(\w+) drops to the floor and sweeps \w+ legs round at you\.$
^(\w+) kicks \w+ leg high and scythes downwards at you\.$
^(\w+) spins into the air and throws a whirlwind kick towards you\.$
^(\w+) hurls \w+ towards you with a lightning-fast moon kick\.$
^(\w+) launches a powerful uppercut at you\.$
^(\w+) forms a spear hand and stabs out at you\.$
^(\w+) twists his torso and sends a roundhouse towards you\.$
^(\w+) throws his palm towards your face\.$
^Blue light crackles forth from (\w+)'s palms, striking you down and snapping your puny limbs\.$
